error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_get_path(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Extension\ExtensionPathResolver::getPath() instead.

The 'sharerich' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256
